responsibilities: Partner with various teams to develop business requirements to standardize the business input and develop a long-term vision.
Design and implement data solutions that drive business impact.
Turn data chaos into scalable, efficient, and automated solutions.
Design, implement, and build data models and pipelines that deliver data with measurable quality under the service level agreement.
Partner with product teams, data analysts, and engineering teams to build foundational data sets that are trusted, well understood, and aligned with business strategy.
Work with the team and stakeholders to scope and prioritize solutions.
Follow rigorous engineering processes to ensure service quality, delivery of new capabilities, and continuously improving metrics.
Understand Microsoft security and privacy guidelines and bring the system in compliance.
Understand Big Data strategy and implement a scalable data platform.
skills: Ability to design and implement data solutions.
Ability to turn data chaos into scalable, efficient, and automated solutions.
Ability to build data models and pipelines.
Ability to work with product teams, data analysts, and engineering teams.
Ability to follow rigorous engineering processes.
Understanding of Microsoft security and privacy guidelines.
analysis: The job responsibilities and skills focus on designing and implementing data solutions, building data models and pipelines, and working with various teams to develop business requirements and foundational data sets. The emphasis is on data management, scalability, efficiency, and compliance with security and privacy guidelines. There is no mention of working with Generative AI (GenAI) or language models (LLMs) specifically. The skills required are related to data engineering, leadership, and understanding of Big Data strategy, but do not explicitly involve AI or language models.
